description: This file defines a theming class for a Flutter mobile application, providing color schemes and styling for Material 3 components.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides a consistent theme for the Flutter app, including colors and component styles.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with the custom color scheme and styles for a light theme.

methods.name: success
methods.description: Returns the color used to indicate success.

methods.name: border
methods.description: Returns the color used for borders.

methods.name: badgeRed
methods.description: Returns a specific red color used for badges or notifications.

methods.name: ratingStar
methods.description: Returns a yellow color used for star ratings.
